mapper.select: SELECT b.id as board_id, -- 별칭 사용 (id 중복 방지) b.member_id, b.title, b.content, b.view_count, -- DB 컬럼명이 view_count라고 가정 (아니면 수정 필요) b.created_at, b.updated_at, m.nickname as author_nickname -- member 테이블의 nickname 가져오기 FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.member_id = m.id -- member 테이블과 JOIN ORDER BY b.created_at DESC
SELECT b.id as board_id, b.member_id, b.title, b.content, b.view_count, b.created_at, b.updated_at, m.nickname as author_nickname FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.member_id = m.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (member_id, title, content) VALUES (#{authorId}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT b.id as board_id, b.member_id, b.title, b.content, b.view_count, b.created_at, b.updated_at, m.nickname as author_nickname FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.member_id = m.id WHERE b.member_id = #{authorId} ORDER BY b.created_at DESC
